name: VIDEO: Professional Fire Crews Make a Difference at Sunshine Summit
description: At a ribbon-cutting ceremony for an updated Sunshine Summit Station, CAL FIRE Deputy Chief Ty Davis describes a rescue and the need for professional crews at San Diego County Fire stations.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: At a ribbon-cutting ceremony for an updated Sunshine Summit Station, CAL FIRE Deputy Chief Ty Davis describes a rescue and the need for professional crews at San Diego County Fire stations.
